translations: n.眨眼（wink 的复数）；打瞌睡
v.眨眼；使眼色；闪烁（wink 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: [口语]睡一会儿，打个盹儿[用于否定句、条件句或疑问句]

sentences.sentence: I'll feel much better when I've had forty winks.
sentences.translation: 我打个盹就会感到好得多。

sentences.sentence: He winks at all the girls who pass.
sentences.translation: 他向所有经过的女孩使眼色。

sentences.sentence: He even essays a few Palinesque winks.
sentences.translation: 甚至于他还抛出了几个佩林式的媚眼。
